description.value:
Prerequisite: Thri-kreen race, ranger, Hunter's Quarry class feature

Benefit: Whenever an enemy adjacent to you takes damage from your Hunter's Quarry, you can deal 2 damage to one other enemy adjacent to you. This damage increases to 3 at 11th level and 4 at 21st level.

Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 109.
